    On This Page

    • Download the tour notebooks

    virtualenvÂ is used to manage Python packages for different projects. Using virtualenv allows you to avoid installing Python packages globally which could break system tools or other projects. You can install virtualenv using pip.

    make sure that pip is up-to-date by running:

    pip install --upgrade pip

python3 -m pip install --user virtualenv
python3 -m venv env
source env/bin/activate

    deactivate

    NumPy.ipynb SciPy.ipynb Pandas.ipynb Matplotlib.ipynb

    Gensim.ipynb Seaborn.ipynb NLTK.ipynb SciKit-Learn.ipynb
